name: SVGTextPathElement
description: The SVGTextPathElement interface corresponds to the <textPath> element.

members.name: SVGTextPathElement.startOffset
members.description: An SVGAnimatedLength corresponding to the X component of the startOffset attribute of the given element.

members.name: SVGTextPathElement.method
members.description: An SVGAnimatedEnumeration corresponding to the method attribute of the given element. It takes one of the TEXTPATH_METHODTYPE_* constants defined on this interface.

members.name: SVGTextPathElement.spacing
members.description: An SVGAnimatedEnumeration corresponding to the spacing attribute of the given element. It takes one of the TEXTPATH_SPACINGTYPE_* constants defined on this interface.
